backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling user profile CRUD with authorization mixins and storing booking inquiries with submission and filtered retrieval APIs.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing two inquiry‑filtering and search enhancements, mapping them to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing responsibilities of various frontend components, hooks, and config files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme definitions configuring color tokens, dark mode variables, and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining metadata, Google Fonts links, and loading the React app root script.
frontend/PRODUCTION_PROMOTION.md: Runbook outlining prerequisites, checks, and steps to promote the build to production on the Internet Computer.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring sections of the site and conditionally rendering the bookings admin section when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button using Internet Identity to log in or out and clear React Query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Lightb: Keyboard‑navigable lightbox modal with focus trap, scroll lock, and previous/next image controls.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Portfo: Simple category filter component rendering selectable buttons including an All option.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: Displays an About section with studio description, stats, and a featured image.
frontend/src/components/sections/Booking: Implements inquiry management with filtering, search, and service-type selection using query hooks.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Provides a contact form with validation, inquiry submission, and contact info display.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Renders a hero banner with background image, title, tagline, and CTA buttons.
frontend/src/components/sections/Portfol: Shows filterable portfolio items with category selection and a lightbox for viewing images.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Lists available photography services with icons, titles, and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/sections/Testimo: Displays a grid of hardcoded client testimonials with ratings and styled cards.
frontend/src/components/site/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with branding, quick links, contact info, and social icons.
frontend/src/components/site/Header.tsx: Provides a responsive header with navigation, login button, scroll behavior, and optional authenticated links.
frontend/src/config/contactInfo.ts: Exports centralized contact details including phones, email, address, and hours.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBodyScrollLock.ts: Locks body scrolling when enabled and restores original styles on cleanup.
frontend/src/hooks/useFocusTrap.ts: Traps keyboard focus within a container when active, restoring previous focus on exit.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for handling Internet Identity auth, login state, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for user profile, submitting and retrieving inquiries, and checking admin status using the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom OKLCH color variables, typography, and dark mode theme definitions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider and loads global styles.
frontend/src/utils/inquiry.ts: Defines service type labels and simple validators for email, required fields, and phone numbers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending fonts, colors, spacing, animations, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, known features, and current state for the inquiries admin UX update.
